/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling in the unseen breeze, casting dappled shadows on the gray pavement. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. The sky above is a clear blue, with wispy clouds scattered across it, adding to the serene ambiance of the scene. The image is a beautiful representation of urban life in Beijing, where nature and cityscape coexist harmoniously.
